intro: Psychotria pisonioides, commonly known as the red Psychotria, is a flowering plant belonging to the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil and Peru. The plant is characterized by its dark green, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white or pale yellow flowers. It produces small, red berries that are edible but have a mild, somewhat bitter taste. Psychotria pisonioides is often found in moist, shaded environments such as rainforests and understorey habitats.
